articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Satellite glints grow in night skies - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Low-altitude constellations may soon account for 10% of glow in some areas
articles.content: TOKYO -- A sharp increase in constellations of low-altitude satellites is transforming the night sky. Used mostly to facilitate high-speed communications, the satellites may soon account for 10% of t… [+602 chars]
